lab5

Class BurgerOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab5.BurgerOrder

  • public class BurgerOrder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the BurgerOrderClass that allows you to store and edit order information.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double BEVERAGES_PRICE
      The final price for beverages
      static double BURGER_PRICE
      The final price for a burger
      static double FRIES_PRICE
      The final price for fries
